/config.description: Choose a Share for Tautulli configuration. Eg: create a Share called tautulli-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/plex-config.description: Choose a Share that holds your Plex configuration. This will allow Tautulli to read the Plex log files.
/plex-config.label: Plex Config

ADVANCED_GIT_BRANCH.description: Choose branch of Tautulli. unless you know which version to try, just type master
ADVANCED_GIT_BRANCH.label: GIT_BRANCH

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Tautulli with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

Tautulli.description: Tautulli, formerly Plexpy, Is a Python-based Plex Usage tracker.
